column4: hi, i'm on ubuntu 10.04, and the maximum resolution i can get for my 30' Dell monitor (connected via hdmi) is 1280x800.  does anyone know how i might be able to increase this
i would try a different driver
hi, thanks for the answer.  i'm actually realy new to linux.  do you know how or where i can find the appropriate display driver for my hardware?
depends on the hardware.. you can start
